IonoObservationProfileDensityShiftedCheb.description: /// Coefficients, using ‘shiftedChebyshev’ sub-field, to describe E, F1, and bottomside F2 profile shapes, or height uncertainty boundaries (upper and lower).

layer.description:
The ionospheric plasma layer.
Example: /// Example: F2
Constraints: No constraints specified.

fstart.description:
Start frequency of the layer, in MHz.
Example: /// Example: 0.2
Constraints: No constraints specified.

fstop.description:
Stop frequency of the layer, in MHz.
Example: /// Example: 1.39
Constraints: No constraints specified.

peakheight.description:
Peak height of the layer, in kilometers.
Example: /// Example: 110.1
Constraints: No constraints specified.

zhalfNm.description:
Height at which density is half of the peak Nm, in kilometers.
Example: /// Example: 210.1
Constraints: No constraints specified.

n.description:
Number of coefficients in the expansion.
Example: /// Example: 5
Constraints: No constraints specified.

coeffs.description:
Array of coefficients.
Example: /// Example: [-11.2, -10.536, 3.357, -0.888, 0.155]
Constraints: No constraints specified.

error.description:
Best fit error.
Example: /// Example: 0.02
Constraints: No constraints specified.
